title: Single-shot labeling of quantum observables
authors: Nidhin Sudarsanan Ragini and M\'ario Ziman
abstract:
We identify and study a particular class of distinguishability problems for
quantum observables (POVMs), in which observables with permuted effects are
involved, which we call as the labeling problem. Consequently, we identify the
binary observables those can be "labeled" perfectly. In this work, we study
these problems in the single-shot regime.
